thread.title: Toronto is No. 1 Canadian destination for US tourists
thread.title_full: Toronto is No. 1 Canadian destination for US tourists

title: Toronto is No. 1 Canadian destination for US tourists
text:
Toronto is No. 1 Canadian destination for US tourists Friday August 28, 2015 Print Article 
The city of Toronto is the top Canadian destination for US travellers in the first half of 2015. — AFP Relaxnews pic LOS ANGELES, Aug 28 — Canada was a popular destination among American travellers in the first half of this year, with a trio of major urban Canadian centres cracking a top 10 list of international destinations for US tourists. 
In the list compiled by online booking site Hotels.com, the top three most popular international destinations remain unchanged from 2014, with London, Paris and Rome leading the pack. 
But rounding out the list are Toronto, Vancouver and Montreal, in fourth, fifth and sixth spots respectively, bumping other cities like Barcelona, Tokyo and Hong Kong further down the list. 
The ranking of top 50 destinations also included newcomers such as Budapest and Ciudad Juarez in Mexico. 
Here are the top 10 international destinations among US travellers so far in 2015: 
1. London
